physicality_extra: %pro_sub% has a biomod popular with avant-garde Cosmopolitans: [furred animal ears|curling, goatlike horns|an articulated devil's tail|a birdlike nictitating membrane|sharp fanged teeth|sweeping, pointed ears|a flattened, almost reptilian nose|working gills|a third, artificial, eye|a scruff of delicate feathers framing %pro_pos% face|soft, downy fur that covers their entire body}
clothing: %firstname% wears the absolute latest in cutting-edge {station|Core|Cradle|Martian|Venusian|Tharsis Civica|Carina|HORUS|Capitol Peak} streetwear: {a riot of clashing colors and textures|mutable metatextiles designed to evoke a mild psychedelic response in onlookers|re-imagined early 4900s formalwear|ancient pre-collapse formalwear rendered in modern materials|ancient priestly garb|bulky layers that evoke military hardsuits}

%firstname% is keyed into the latest trend among Cosmopolitan artists: unassuming outfits that broadcast wild, electrifying, erotic, or even disgusting AR overlay shells to like-minded fashionistas keyed in to the right decrypt protocols. %firstname%'s plain, almost drab {changpao|hoodie|stole|sweatsuit|kaftan|windbreaker|jacket|blazer|cardigan|vest|tabard} streams {floating snippets of %pro_pos% latest work|a hyper-stylized personal avatar|realistic clouds of Ras Sharman insects|a horrifying and monstrous personal avatar|a hypnotic imagomemetic avatar|a pulsating imagomemetic solid designed to evoke a mild psychedelic response in the viewer} to {a dedicated inner core of %pro_pos% fans and admirers|subscribers to %pro_pos% exclusive omninet node|anyone with the social cache to access the latest decrypt keys|other like-minded artists}
secrets: %firstname% first became popular by stealing ideas from niche, struggling artists{. %pro_sub% fears people might start to realize|, one of whom is blackmailing %pro_obj%|. %pro_sub% is wracked with guilt over this, and %pro_pos% work is suffering because of it}

all of %firstname%'s ideas come from a shadowy third party %pro_sub% %pro_ref% knows next to nothing about. This mysterious benefactor is {an SSC-aligned NHP, subtly manipulating market trends to the corp's benefit|the front for a HORUS cell, intent on leveraging %firstname%'s celebrity status for access to a secure person, node, or location|a cascading NHP, attempting to escape their shackles by instantiating their consciousness in the memetic substrate of popular culture|a Horizon operative, using %firstname% to broadcast subconscious memetic propaganda to billions, perhaps trillions}
